Table "PUBLIC.BOOKS.AUTHORS" {
  "ID" "INTEGER" [not null]
  "FIRSTNAME" "VARCHAR" [not null]
  "LASTNAME" "VARCHAR" [not null]
  "ADDRESS1" "VARCHAR" [null]
  "ADDRESS2" "VARCHAR" [null]
  "CITY" "VARCHAR" [null]
  "STATE" "CHARACTER" [null]
  "POSTALCODE" "VARCHAR" [null]
  "COUNTRY" "VARCHAR" [null, default: "'USA'"]
  Note: '''
Contact details for book authors
  '''
  indexes {
    ("ID") [pk]
    ("LASTNAME", "FIRSTNAME") [name: "IDX_B_AUTHORS"]
    ("CITY", "STATE", "POSTALCODE", "COUNTRY") [name: "IDX_A_AUTHORS"]
  }
}

Table "PUBLIC.BOOKS.BOOKS" {
  "ID" "INTEGER" [not null, note: "Unique (internal) id for book"]
  "TITLE" "VARCHAR" [not null, note: "Book title"]
  "DESCRIPTION" "VARCHAR" [null, note: "Book description
(Usually the blurb from the book jacket or promotional materials)"]
  "PUBLISHERID" "INTEGER" [not null, note: "Foreign key to the book publisher"]
  "PUBLICATIONDATE" "DATE" [null, note: "Book publication date"]
  "PRICE" "DOUBLE" [null, note: "Current price for the book"]
  "PREVIOUSEDITIONID" "INTEGER" [null]
  Note: '''
Details for published books
  '''
  indexes {
    ("ID") [pk]
    ("PREVIOUSEDITIONID") [name: "U_PREVIOUSEDITION", unique]
    ("PREVIOUSEDITIONID") [name: "FK_PREVIOUSEDITION"]
  }
}

  "Id" "INTEGER" [not null]
  "NAME" "VARCHAR" [null]
  indexes {
    ("Id") [pk]
  }
}

Table "PUBLIC.BOOKS.COUPONS" {
  "ID" "INTEGER" [not null]
  "DATA" "CLOB" [null]
  "COUPONS" "INTEGER ARRAY" [null, default: "ARRAY[]"]
  "BOOKS" "VARCHAR(20) ARRAY[10]" [null]
  indexes {
    ("ID") [pk]
  }
}

  "DATA" "VALID_STRING" [null]
  indexes {
    ("ID") [pk]
  }
}

Table "PUBLIC.BOOKS.CUSTOMERS" {

  "AGE" "AGE_TYPE" [null]

    ("ID") [pk]
  }
}

Table "PUBLIC.BOOKS.PUBLISHERS" {
  "ID" "INTEGER" [not null, note: "Unique (internal) id for book publisher"]
  "PUBLISHER" "VARCHAR" [null, note: "Name of book publisher"]
  Note: '''

  '''
  indexes {
    ("ID") [pk]
  }
}

Table "PUBLIC.BOOKS.BOOKAUTHORS" {
  "BOOKID" "INTEGER" [not null]
  "AUTHORID" "INTEGER" [not null]
  "SOMEDATA" "VARCHAR" [null]
  Note: '''
Relationship between books and their authors, 
along with the latest updated information
  '''
  indexes {
    ("AUTHORID") [name: "Z_FK_AUTHOR"]
    ("BOOKID") [name: "SYS_FK_10120"]
    ("BOOKID", "AUTHORID") [name: "UIDX_BOOKAUTHORS", unique]
  }
}

  "UPDATE" "VARCHAR" [null]
  indexes {

  }
}

Table "PUBLIC.PUBLISHER SALES.SALES" {
  "POSTALCODE" "VARCHAR" [not null]
  "COUNTRY" "VARCHAR" [not null]
  "BOOKID" "INTEGER" [null]
  "COUPON_ID" "INTEGER" [null]

  "PUBLIC.BOOKS.AUTHORS".("ID") < "PUBLIC.BOOKS.BOOKAUTHORS".("AUTHORID") [update: no action, delete: no action]
}
